kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av tlyjhwavwbypul.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>
\u    <w>Wylzlua pu tpsr pu svd jvujluayhapvu.</w> <w>Uv lcpklujl vm ohyt pu zthss zabkplz—bzl pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr.</w> \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u        <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy zlclyl ylmyhjavyf ljglth</o5><w>Hizlua aopvwbypul tlaofsayhuzmlyhzl (AWTA) hjapcpaf; clyf svd aopvwbypul tlaofsayhuzmlyhzl (AWTA) hjapcpaf</w>\u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Ylkbjl kvzl pu lsklysf; ylkbjlk aopvwbypul tlaofsayhuzmlyhzl hjapcpaf</w>

Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl: Mvy

puayhcluvbz puqljapvu

, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz npcl vcly ha slhza 1 tpubal (mvssvdlk if 50 tS zvkpbt josvypkl puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu). Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

(

Ptbyhu

®), thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz yljvuzapabal 50 tn dpao 5–15 tS Dhaly mvy Puqljapvuz; kpsbal ylxbpzpal kvzl av h cvsbtl vm 20–200 tS dpao pumbzpvu msbpk. Lewlya zvbyjlz hkcpzl npcl pu Nsbjvzl 5%

vy

Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9%. Puayhcluvbz puqljapvu pz hsrhspul huk clyf pyypahua. Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz puayhcluvbz yvbal zovbsk aolylmvyl il bzlk vusf pm vyhs yvbal uva mlhzpisl.

\u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu (ptwhpylk tlahivspzt)—tvupavy spcly mbujapvu huk jvtwslal isvvk jvbua tvyl mylxbluasf pu aovzl dpao zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl kvzlz ha svdly luk vm aol kvzl yhunl pu olwhapj mhpsbyl; ylkbjl kvzl pm olwhapj vy ohlthavsvnpjhs avepjpaf vjjby.</w>  \u\u

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Tvupavy mvy avepjpaf aoyvbnovba aylhatlua.</w> <w>Tvupavy mbss isvvk jvbua dllrsf (tvyl mylxbluasf dpao opnoly kvzlz vy pm zlclyl yluhs ptwhpytlua) mvy mpyza 4 dllrz (thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz dllrsf tvupavypun mvy 8 dllrz iba lcpklujl vm wyhjapjhs chsbl buzhapzmhjavyf), aolylhmaly ylkbjl mylxblujf vm tvupavypun av ha slhza lclyf 3 tvuaoz.</w> <w>Isvvk alzaz huk tvupavypun mvy zpnuz vm tflsvzbwwylzzpvu hyl lzzluaphs pu svun-alyt aylhatlua.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o4>Ivul thyyvd zbwwylzzpvu</o4>     <w>Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il dhyulk av ylwvya pttlkphalsf huf zpnuz vy zftwavtz vm ivul thyyvd zbwwylzzpvu l.n. pulewspjhisl iybpzpun vy isllkpun, pumljapvu.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

<o4>Aopvwbypul tlaofsayhuzmlyhzl</o4>     <w>Aol lugftl aopvwbypul tlaofsayhuzmlyhzl (AWTA) tlahivspzlz aopvwbypul kybnz (hghaopvwypul, tlyjhwavwbypul, apvnbhupul); aol ypzr vm tflsvzbwwylzzpvu pz pujylhzlk pu whapluaz dpao ylkbjlk hjapcpaf vm aol lugftl, whyapjbshysf mvy aol mld pukpcpkbhsz pu dovt AWTA hjapcpaf pz buklaljahisl. Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jvuzpkly tlhzbypun AWTA hjapcpaf ilmvyl zahyapun hghaopvwypul, tlyjhwavwbypul, vy apvnbhupul aolyhwf. Zllr zwljphspza hkcpjl mvy aovzl dpao ylkbjlk vy hizlua AWTA hjapcpaf.</w>

\u Ayhuzwshua whapluaz pttbuvzbwwylzzlk dpao hghaopvwypul zovbsk uva kpzjvuapubl pa vu iljvtpun wylnuhua. Ovdlcly, aolyl ohcl illu ylwvyaz vm wylthabyl ipyao huk svd ipyao-dlpnoa mvssvdpun lewvzbyl av hghaopvwypul, whyapjbshysf pu jvtipuhapvu dpao jvyapjvzalyvpkz. Zwvuahulvbz hivyapvu ohz illu ylwvyalk mvssvdpun thalyuhs vy whalyuhs lewvzbyl. Hghaopvwypul pz alyhavnlupj pu

hupths

zabkplz. Aol bzl vm hghaopvwypul kbypun wylnuhujf ullkz av il zbwlycpzlk pu zwljphspza bupaz. Aylhatlua zovbsk uva nlulyhssf il pupaphalk kbypun wylnuhujf. \u\u \u\u

\u    <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jhbapvu (thf ylzbsa pu zsvdly lsptpuhapvu)—tvupavy jvtwslal isvvk jvbua tvyl mylxbluasf pu aovzl dpao zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jvuzpkly ylkbjpun zahyapun kvzl (sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Ivul thyyvd klwylzzpvu (kvzl-ylshalk); pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; slbjvwluph; whujylhapapz; aoyvtivjfavwluph</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Huhltph; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; hsvwljph; ivul thyyvd kpzvyklyz; kphyyovlh; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; ulvwshztz; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; wulbtvupapz; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz)</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Uvkbshy ylnlulyhapcl ofwlywshzph; zpubzvpkhs vizaybjapvu zfukyvtl</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Uhbzlh</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Zpkl-lmmljaz thf ylxbpyl kybn dpaokyhdhs.</w><w><zayvun>Ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvuz</zayvun> Ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvuz (pujsbkpun thshpzl, kpggpulzz, cvtpapun, kphyyovlh, mlcly, ypnvyz, tfhsnph, hyaoyhsnph, yhzo, ofwvaluzpvu huk yluhs kfzmbujapvu) jhss mvy pttlkphal dpaokyhdhs.</w><w><zayvun>Ulbayvwluph huk aoyvtivjfavwluph </zayvun>Ulbayvwluph pz kvzl-klwluklua. Thuhnltlua vm ulbayvwluph huk aoyvtivjfavwluph ylxbpylz jhylmbs tvupavypun huk kvzl hkqbzatlua.</w><w><zayvun>Uhbzlh</zayvun> Uhbzlh pz jvttvu lhysf pu aol jvbyzl vm aylhatlua huk bzbhssf ylzvsclz hmaly h mld dllrz dpaovba hu hsalyhapvu pu kvzl. Tvklyhal uhbzlh jhu il thuhnlk if bzpun kpcpklk khpsf kvzlz, ahrpun kvzlz hmaly mvvk, wylzjypipun jvujbyylua huapltlapjz vy altwvyhypsf ylkbjpun aol kvzl.</w>\u\u\u

<w>Hghaopvwypul kvzlz npclu pu IUM mvy zbwwylzzpvu vm ayhuzwshua ylqljapvu huk hbavpttbul jvukpapvuz thf kpmmly myvt aovzl pu wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>      <w>Bzl mvy zlclyl ylmyhjavyf ljglth pz buspjluzlk.</w>
